valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Sat 20 Sep 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Sun 21 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low Norwegian Basin 994 losing its identity by midnight tonight. New low expected Humber 997 by same time
